name: Magical MILFs
description:
10 years ago the Pure Maidens defeated the evil organization Nega-Force! After 10 years of peace the Nega-Force is back, and after a sinister corporate rebranding are now known as the "Neo Nega-Force" now the world is once again in need of the Pure Maidens! During those peaceful 10 years the Pure Maidens settled down, got married, and grew up into mature beauties. When they re-emerge to face off against the Neo Nega-Force

That's where our protagonist, Ryohei, comes in! He is a normal citizen, with normal lustful desires about his not-so-normal neighbor Ayumi when he uncovers her secret identity is Pure Sapphire! During a tussle with the Neo Nega-Force, Ryohei catches Ayumi transform into Pure Sapphire and uses this to blackmail her into indulging in his dirty fantasies with the Magical MILF!



  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • The Pure Maidens are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 24 magical scenes of corrupting the Pure Maidens.

Magical MILFs is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.
